mapper.select: select * from store where LOCATION LIKE '%'|| #{location} ||'%'

select b.BOOKING_ID BOOKING_ID,b.FULL_NAME FULL_NAME, s.STORE_ID STORE_ID,s.NAME NAME, TO_CHAR(b.BOOKING_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')as BOOKING_DATE,b.PHONE_NUMBER PHONE_NUMBER, b.TIME TIME from booking b,store s
where b.store_id=s.store_id and FULL_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{fullName} ||'%'
where b.store_id=s.store_id and PHONE_NUMBER LIKE '%'|| #{phoneNumber} ||'%'
